name: Amazon UK Clean 2014 v1.5 (ad-blocker)
description: This style will hide most unnecessary panel/ads on Amazon.co.uk leaving just the information that matters about the item your looking at.
additional_info:
v1.0 23th Jun 2013 - search and item page ads removed
v1.1 25th Sep 2013 - ads blocked for those without adblock+
v1.2 27th Sep 2013 - more ads and banners blocked
v1.3 07th Jan 2014 - another ad banner blocked
v1.4 11th Oct 2014 - removed wish list ad other users viewed
v1.5 12th Oct 2014 - removed advert bottom search results
